message: As soon as the doors start to open, Ren leaps from my arms and darts through the gap.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey! Ren!"
He's gone in an instant.
What the hell is going on?!
I chase after him, but have to stop to apologize to a woman I nearly knock over.
It occurs to me that her clothes seem awfully fancy, and then I realize that we've stepped into some kind of ballroom.
The little blue blur quickly vanishes between the legs of the partygoers.
I know how out of place I look, but I don't have a choice.

Everyone is milling around, holding glasses and plates as they chatter.

People glance at me as I pass, but quickly return to their conversations like nothing is out of the ordinary.
I get the feeling they've decided to pretend I'm not here. Can't let anything ruin their perfect world, after all.
Still, it seems like disquiet is spreading. The last thing I need is for someone to call the guards.
Better find Ren and get out of here.
Where the hell did he go? If I don't find him soon...
...Huh?
What was that just now?
I see a man moving through the crowd.
Is that...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh!"
Pain rips through my skull. The room whirls around me.
My vision doubles and triples. I stagger.
Sounds distort and repeat like a damaged tape. I can't hear anything through the noise.
What the...
My head pounds in time with my pulse. My legs feel like lead. I can't take another step.
What's... happening...?

name: 白蒼葉
message: "Does he mean that much to you?"
Suddenly, I hear a voice in my ear.

name: 白蒼葉
message: "You care about him. Yeah, I know."

name: 白蒼葉
message: "Have you ever wondered why?"
Who's speaking? I can't see him. I can only hear his voice.
The pain is getting worse.

name: 白蒼葉
message: "The truth is you already know. After all, you're―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut up."

name: 白蒼葉
message: "But you've made your choice."

name: 白蒼葉
message: "Keep pushing forward. Follow your heart, your desires."

name: 白蒼葉
message: "No one can stop you."

name: 白蒼葉
message: "The real you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shut up!"
Everyone in the ballroom turns to look at me.
...They're laughing.
They see that I'm in pain... <K>and they're laughing.
